data.title: Oracle Education Foundation :: Air Systems
data.text:
Value Delivered

Air Systems delivered design-build plumbing solutions for a new, 64,000-square-foot, two-story high school. Through the installation of high-efficiency fixtures, we helped the facility realize a 20 percent reduction in water usage.

Client Objectives

Oracle Education Foundation needed design-built plumbing solutions for their new learning institution. They chose Air Systems to design, build, and install plumbing systems capable of servicing 580 students and staff because of our reputation for working in tight timeframes while delivering efficient systems.

Solutions

Design-build services

Designed, built, and installed full commercial kitchen and plumbing solutions

Client Background
